item.title: Green Shoes Manual - Colors List
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
I've been riveting on coding Green Shoes Manual lately.
It bacame possible to display Colors List today. ;-)

Display processing part was almost finished.
The rest of to-do list for Green Shoes Maual is the following:

- keyword link within the manual like wiki
- keyword search

But above two are never easy. So, I'm thinking to rewrite the contents (documents) first.

Have a good weekend,
ashbb

ps. Another snapshot. ;-)
